Html: Is it possible to put in a priority set up on Rawr for Afflict 'locks as our rotation is more of priority then rotation, as well as situational. I mean we only should have to cast corruption once during any given fight, and should be casting drain soul when a target is below 25%. Also, with the advent of 3.3 fel puppy is the new succubus.

This is a brand new warlock module, so

- pets are not active yet. This will be added back after I finish triple-checking the spell damage, coefficients, etc.

- the new warlock module is already using a PriorityQueue, so once it completes the initial rotation, it will then begin casting spells in order of the next highest priority. Unfortunately you cant see this just yet, because I did not attach the combat simulation results to the events view. DrainSoul < 25% and Decimation < 35% will also be added soon.

:) thanks, I'll look forward to that

 

My only other problem is that I can't seem to get the module to spit out numbers or gear upgrades with warlocks, but it works for every other class. . . . does this have anything to do with anything or just my system?

Haldir,

At this time the module is in heavy development by ArPharazon, so there is a lot left to do, and at this time you will not see all of the correct values.
Okay, but I'm getting no values is what Im tryying to say

Absolutely no values at all?

In that case, please post a new issue (in the tracker) and then attach your saved character profile so I can check it out.
